comments.author: Werner
comments.body: Wow, that guy never sleeps! Now I see his donut hobby in a whole new way...

comments.author: Dave
comments.body: Sorry we missed you , Steve. Or maybe you missed us. Doubly tragic for you because it was riddim' day on the Frenzy; Dyno Don Grusin joined us for a high-cadence tour out east. The guy's a [jammer](http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=CD1OXTrw7Tk&feature=related) both in and out of the studio. He'll be back... I have his metronome. DU

comments.author: Steve
comments.body: Wow! That guy has mad skillz. Can't wait to meet him.
